channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Grab these cheap and colorful JLab earbuds for less than $18 - a Black Friday bargain
item.description: The JLab Go Air Pop are some super-cheap earbuds that punch well above their weight - and they're now down to a super-low price of $17.49 for Black Friday.

item.title: Amazon has Black Friday prices on tech gadgets today only - 50% off TVs, PS5, Apple, and more
item.description: Today only, Amazon has special Black Friday prices on gift-worthy tech gadgets, and I'm rounding up the 50 best deals on TVs, Apple devices, tablets, and more.

item.title: The Next Big X-Men Comic Takes Mutantkind Back to School
item.description: Educating the youth beckons the Children of the Atom once more in the upcoming comic 'X-Men United.'

item.title: X’s new About This Account feature is going great
item.description: A new feature seemingly revealed many right-wing “America First” accounts are actually based outside the United States. But the data seems questionable.

item.title: "We see something very different" - Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang dismisses AI bubble talk, and I guess he should know
item.description: Huang dismisses AI bubble fears, underlines infrastructure demand, Nvidia revenue growth, and a three-pronged strategy for data, applications, and autonomous AI

item.title: 6 new 4K Blu-rays to add to your collection from November 2025
item.description: It's the 1st anniversary of Blu-ray Bounty, and we've got 6 new discs for you to add to your 4K Blu-ray collection.

item.title: « Arrêtez d’utiliser ce smartphone » : la notification d’Amazon envoyée aux propriétaires du Google Pixel 6a
item.description: Amazon a dégainé l'artillerie lourde ce matin en envoyant des alertes de sécurité massives concernant le Pixel 6a. Le motif ? Un risque d'hyperthermie. La réponse de Google ? Une mise à jour qui va volontairement brider votre téléphone.

item.title: LG OLED C5 en promo : pourquoi c’est (enfin) le moment de changer de TV pendant le Black Friday
item.description: On attendait une baisse de prix sur la gamme 2025, mais pas aussi violente. Avec un code promo cumulable chez Son-Vidéo, le LG C5 de 65 pouces devient l'affaire incontournable de ce Black Friday.

item.title: Withings Thermo : remise immédiate sur le thermomètre connecté sans contact
item.description: C'est un produit de niche, mais c'est le meilleur de sa catégorie. Si vous cherchez la précision sans réveiller toute la maison, cette offre sur le Withings Thermo est sans doute le "bon plan santé" du week-end.

item.title: The 5 best Black Friday 85-inch TV deals, chosen by our TV review team
item.description: From gorgeous OLED TVs to super-affordable models, it's never been cheaper to buy a huge honkin' TV

item.title: Pixel arrays, matrix headlights, OLED taillights: new lighting tech is bedazzling EVs
item.description: EV car lighting is becoming as complex and interesting as the display tech that helps power projectors and TVs.

item.title: Oubliez la serpillière : c’est le moment de craquer pour un aspirateur laveur sans se ruiner
item.description: On voit passer des dizaines d'aspirateurs balais, mais celui-ci a un truc en plus. Il lave à l'eau chaude et ne coûte pas 500 euros. Avec cette promo Black Friday chez Boulanger, le Mova M10 devient l'affaire à saisir pour vos sols.

item.title: The Magnifique ‘Castlevania: Nocturne’ Art Comes Together In New Art Book
item.description: Still no verdict on if 'Castlevania: Nocturne' is coming back, but this art book coming out in March can tide you over until news breaks.

item.title: Free ChatGPT is coming for teachers - OpenAI looks to spread influence of its chatbot into schools
item.description: OpenAI launches ChatGPT for Teachers, combining unlimited GPT-5.1 access, collaboration features, privacy compliance, and tools designed to support lesson planning.
